extension.valueString: ADI Observation No ADI Example OPTION 3

extension.valueMarkdown: This is a Observation example for the USCDI5 ADI Observation Data Element to show whether a patient has an advance directive using a new code = "45481-9" - (Advance directive - none ?) and value of "Yes"/"No"/"Unknown" (TODO: pick a convenient value set  LOINC answer list ll50-6, Snomed, hl7 (https://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet-yes-no-unknown-not-asked.html))
